title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Science Knowledge-Building Workshop Using Social Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Within one week, learners generate at least three collaborative knowledge artifacts (e.g., concept maps, reports) on science topics.
Through a peer feedback system, learners improve the quality of shared knowledge resources by at least 80%.
Learners complete activities at each stage of the knowledge transformation model (creation-representation-organization-review) in social learning environments with over 90% proficiency.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
